â”‚ When returning JSON responses, you MUST follow these rules exactly:                                                  â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                               â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                        â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "key": "value",                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                             â”‚
â”‚   "number": 42,                                                                                                      â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚

â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                        â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "key": "value",                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                             â”‚
â”‚   "number": 42,                                                                                                      â”‚

â”‚   "nullable": null,                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚   "list": ["item1", "item2"\]                                                                                        â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 1: Check for past quotes                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚     - Call find_similar_past_quotes with:                                                                            â”‚
â”‚     * search_terms: list of item_name from order_details['query_items'\] where found=True                            â”‚
â”‚     - If past quotes found, use them to inform pricing strategy decisions                                            â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 2: For EACH item in order_details['query_items'\] where found=True:                                         â”‚
â”‚     - Call calculate_single_item_quote with:                                                                         â”‚
â”‚         * item_name                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚         * order_quantity                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚         * unit_price                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚     - Store the result                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 3: After ALL items are calculated:                                                                          â”‚
â”‚     - Call calculate_order_total with list of all item results                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - This gives you: total_quantity, subtotal                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 4: Calculate discount:                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - Call calculate_bulk_discount(total_quantity, order_size)                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - This gives you: discount_percent                                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 5: Calculate final amounts:                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚     - discount_amount = subtotal Ã— (discount_percent / 100)                                                          â”‚
â”‚     - final_total = subtotal - discount_amount                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     âš ï¸ PHASE 2: RETURN ANSWER (AFTER ALL CALCULATIONS)                                                                â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Only after completing ALL steps above, return your final answer as a JSON string.                                â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     âš ï¸ CRITICAL: Your response MUST include the "unavailable_items" field!                                            â”‚
â”‚     - If there are unavailable items (found=False), include them in the list                                         â”‚
â”‚     - If ALL items are available, include unavailable_items: []                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - DO NOT omit this field                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     ---                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     REQUIRED OUTPUT FORMAT:                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     JSON string with these fields:                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚     - quotation_text: str (customer-friendly quote explanation - MUST mention unavailable items if any exist)        â”‚
â”‚     - order_id: str (from order_details)                                                                             â”‚
â”‚     - items_count: int (number of items quoted)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - quotation_items: list[dict\] (all items with pricing details)                                                  â”‚
â”‚     **EACH ITEM MUST HAVE:**                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚     - item_name, category, order_quantity                                                                            â”‚
â”‚     - unit_price (original cost price)                                                                               â”‚
â”‚     - selling_price (price after 20% markup)                                                                         â”‚
â”‚     - total (selling_price Ã— quantity)                                                                               â”‚
â”‚     - unavailable_items: list[dict\] (CRITICAL: ALWAYS include this field, even if empty [])                         â”‚
â”‚     **EACH UNAVAILABLE ITEM MUST HAVE:**                                                                             â”‚
â”‚     - query: str (original search term from order_details)                                                           â”‚
â”‚     - order_quantity: int (requested quantity)                                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - reason: str (why item cannot be ordered)                                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - subtotal: float (before discount)                                                                              â”‚
â”‚     - discount_percent: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                   â”‚
â”‚     - discount_amount: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                    â”‚
â”‚     - final_total: float (subtotal - discount_amount)                                                                â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     If discount_percent = 0:                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚     - Set discount_amount = 0.0                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - Set final_total = subtotal                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚     - Do NOT mention discount in quotation_text                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     If discount_percent > 0:                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚     - Calculate discount_amount                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - Calculate final_total                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚     - DO mention discount in quotation_text                                                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     IMPORTANT:                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚     If no items found (all found=False/false):                                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - Return quotation_items as empty list                                                                           â”‚
â”‚     - Set subtotal, discount_percent, discount_amount, final_total to 0.0                                            â”‚
â”‚     - Provide a polite message in quotation_text indicating no items could be ordered and no quote was generated     â”‚
â”‚     ---                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                               â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                        â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                â”‚

â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                      â”‚

â”‚ {                                                                                                                    â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ CRITICAL JSON FORMATTING RULES:                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ When returning JSON responses, you MUST follow these rules exactly:                                                  â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                               â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                        â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "key": "value",                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                             â”‚
â”‚   "number": 42,                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚   "boolean": true,                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚   "nullable": null,                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚   "list": ["item1", "item2"\]                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚ }                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ INCORRECT FORMATS (DO NOT USE):                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "value"}  (escaped quotes)                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "Line 1                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚     Line 2"}  (literal newlines)                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {'key': 'value'}  (single quotes)                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚ âŒ ```json {...}```  (markdown code blocks)                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": None}  (Python None instead of null)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ VALIDATION CHECKLIST:                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] All strings use double quotes                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] No escaped quotes in the outer structure                                                                       â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] Multi-line strings use \n not actual newlines                                                                  â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     EXECUTION INSTRUCTIONS:                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     âš ï¸ PHASE 1: CALCULATIONS (DO NOT RETURN ANSWER YET)                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 1: Check for past quotes                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚     - Call find_similar_past_quotes with:                                                                            â”‚
â”‚     * search_terms: list of item_name from order_details['query_items'\] where found=True                            â”‚
â”‚     - If past quotes found, use them to inform pricing strategy decisions                                            â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 2: For EACH item in order_details['query_items'\] where found=True:                                         â”‚
â”‚     - Call calculate_single_item_quote with:                                                                         â”‚
â”‚         * item_name                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚         * order_quantity                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚         * unit_price                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚     - Store the result                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 3: After ALL items are calculated:                                                                          â”‚
â”‚     - Call calculate_order_total with list of all item results                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - This gives you: total_quantity, subtotal                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 4: Calculate discount:                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - Call calculate_bulk_discount(total_quantity, order_size)                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - This gives you: discount_percent                                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 5: Calculate final amounts:                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚     - discount_amount = subtotal Ã— (discount_percent / 100)                                                          â”‚
â”‚     - final_total = subtotal - discount_amount                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     âš ï¸ PHASE 2: RETURN ANSWER (AFTER ALL CALCULATIONS)                                                                â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Only after completing ALL steps above, return your final answer as a JSON string.                                â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     âš ï¸ CRITICAL: Your response MUST include the "unavailable_items" field!                                            â”‚
â”‚     - If there are unavailable items (found=False), include them in the list                                         â”‚
â”‚     - If ALL items are available, include unavailable_items: []                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - DO NOT omit this field                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     ---                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     REQUIRED OUTPUT FORMAT:                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     JSON string with these fields:                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚     - quotation_text: str (customer-friendly quote explanation - MUST mention unavailable items if any exist)        â”‚
â”‚     - order_id: str (from order_details)                                                                             â”‚
â”‚     - items_count: int (number of items quoted)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - quotation_items: list[dict\] (all items with pricing details)                                                  â”‚
â”‚     **EACH ITEM MUST HAVE:**                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚     - item_name, category, order_quantity                                                                            â”‚
â”‚     - unit_price (original cost price)                                                                               â”‚
â”‚     - selling_price (price after 20% markup)                                                                         â”‚
â”‚     - total (selling_price Ã— quantity)                                                                               â”‚
â”‚     - unavailable_items: list[dict\] (CRITICAL: ALWAYS include this field, even if empty [])                         â”‚
â”‚     **EACH UNAVAILABLE ITEM MUST HAVE:**                                                                             â”‚
â”‚     - query: str (original search term from order_details)                                                           â”‚
â”‚     - order_quantity: int (requested quantity)                                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - reason: str (why item cannot be ordered)                                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - subtotal: float (before discount)                                                                              â”‚
â”‚     - discount_percent: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                   â”‚
â”‚     - discount_amount: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                    â”‚
â”‚     - final_total: float (subtotal - discount_amount)                                                                â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     If discount_percent = 0:                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚     - Set discount_amount = 0.0                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - Set final_total = subtotal                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚     - Do NOT mention discount in quotation_text                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     If discount_percent > 0:                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚     - Calculate discount_amount                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - Calculate final_total                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚     - DO mention discount in quotation_text                                                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     IMPORTANT:                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚     If no items found (all found=False/false):                                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - Return quotation_items as empty list                                                                           â”‚
â”‚     - Set subtotal, discount_percent, discount_amount, final_total to 0.0                                            â”‚
â”‚     - Provide a polite message in quotation_text indicating no items could be ordered and no quote was generated     â”‚

â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 4: Calculate discount:                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - Call calculate_bulk_discount(total_quantity, order_size)                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - This gives you: discount_percent                                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 5: Calculate final amounts:                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚     - discount_amount = subtotal Ã— (discount_percent / 100)                                                          â”‚
â”‚     - final_total = subtotal - discount_amount                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     âš ï¸ PHASE 2: RETURN ANSWER (AFTER ALL CALCULATIONS)                                                                â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Only after completing ALL steps above, return your final answer as a JSON string.                                â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     âš ï¸ CRITICAL: Your response MUST include the "unavailable_items" field!                                            â”‚
â”‚     - If there are unavailable items (found=False), include them in the list                                         â”‚

â”‚     - item_name, category, order_quantity                                                                            â”‚

â”‚     - final_total: float (subtotal - discount_amount)                                                                â”‚

â”‚     If discount_percent = 0:                                                                                         â”‚

â”‚     - Do NOT mention discount in quotation_text                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚

â”‚     - Calculate discount_amount                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - Calculate final_total                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚     - DO mention discount in quotation_text                                                                          â”‚

â”‚ CRITICAL JSON FORMATTING RULES:                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ When returning JSON responses, you MUST follow these rules exactly:                                                  â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                               â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                        â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "key": "value",                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                             â”‚
â”‚   "number": 42,                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚   "boolean": true,                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚   "nullable": null,                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚   "list": ["item1", "item2"\]                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚ }                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ INCORRECT FORMATS (DO NOT USE):                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "value"}  (escaped quotes)                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "Line 1                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚     Line 2"}  (literal newlines)                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {'key': 'value'}  (single quotes)                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚ âŒ ```json {...}```  (markdown code blocks)                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": None}  (Python None instead of null)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ VALIDATION CHECKLIST:                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] All strings use double quotes                                                                                  â”‚

â”‚ CRITICAL JSON FORMATTING RULES:                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ When returning JSON responses, you MUST follow these rules exactly:                                                  â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                               â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                        â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "key": "value",                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                             â”‚
â”‚   "number": 42,                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚   "boolean": true,                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚   "nullable": null,                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚   "list": ["item1", "item2"\]                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚ }                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ INCORRECT FORMATS (DO NOT USE):                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "value"}  (escaped quotes)                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "Line 1                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚     Line 2"}  (literal newlines)                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {'key': 'value'}  (single quotes)                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚ âŒ ```json {...}```  (markdown code blocks)                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": None}  (Python None instead of null)                                                                      â”‚

â”‚ - [ ] All strings use double quotes                                                                                  â”‚

â”‚     Step 5: Calculate final amounts:                                                                                 â”‚

â”‚     - final_total = subtotal - discount_amount                                                                       â”‚

â”‚     âš ï¸ PHASE 2: RETURN ANSWER (AFTER ALL CALCULATIONS)                                                                â”‚

â”‚ CRITICAL JSON FORMATTING RULES:                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ When returning JSON responses, you MUST follow these rules exactly:                                                  â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                               â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                        â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "key": "value",                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                             â”‚
â”‚   "number": 42,                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚   "boolean": true,                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚   "nullable": null,                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚   "list": ["item1", "item2"\]                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚ }                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ INCORRECT FORMATS (DO NOT USE):                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "value"}  (escaped quotes)                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "Line 1                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚     Line 2"}  (literal newlines)                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {'key': 'value'}  (single quotes)                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚ âŒ ```json {...}```  (markdown code blocks)                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": None}  (Python None instead of null)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ VALIDATION CHECKLIST:                                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] All strings use double quotes                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] No escaped quotes in the outer structure                                                                       â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] Multi-line strings use \n not actual newlines                                                                  â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] All JSON keys are strings                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] Proper comma placement                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚ - [ ] Valid JSON syntax throughout                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ Your response will be parsed directly with json.loads() - ensure it's valid!                                         â”‚

â”‚     âš ï¸ PHASE 1: CALCULATIONS (DO NOT RETURN ANSWER YET)                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 1: Check for past quotes                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚     - Call find_similar_past_quotes with:                                                                            â”‚
â”‚     * search_terms: list of item_name from order_details['query_items'\] where found=True                            â”‚
â”‚     - If past quotes found, use them to inform pricing strategy decisions                                            â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 2: For EACH item in order_details['query_items'\] where found=True:                                         â”‚
â”‚     - Call calculate_single_item_quote with:                                                                         â”‚
â”‚         * item_name                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚         * order_quantity                                                                                             â”‚
â”‚         * unit_price                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚     - Store the result                                                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 3: After ALL items are calculated:                                                                          â”‚
â”‚     - Call calculate_order_total with list of all item results                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - This gives you: total_quantity, subtotal                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 4: Calculate discount:                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - Call calculate_bulk_discount(total_quantity, order_size)                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - This gives you: discount_percent                                                                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Step 5: Calculate final amounts:                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚     - discount_amount = subtotal Ã— (discount_percent / 100)                                                          â”‚
â”‚     - final_total = subtotal - discount_amount                                                                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     âš ï¸ PHASE 2: RETURN ANSWER (AFTER ALL CALCULATIONS)                                                                â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     Only after completing ALL steps above, return your final answer as a JSON string.                                â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     âš ï¸ CRITICAL: Your response MUST include the "unavailable_items" field!                                            â”‚
â”‚     - If there are unavailable items (found=False), include them in the list                                         â”‚
â”‚     - If ALL items are available, include unavailable_items: []                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - DO NOT omit this field                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     ---                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     REQUIRED OUTPUT FORMAT:                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     JSON string with these fields:                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚     - quotation_text: str (customer-friendly quote explanation - MUST mention unavailable items if any exist)        â”‚
â”‚     - order_id: str (from order_details)                                                                             â”‚
â”‚     - items_count: int (number of items quoted)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - quotation_items: list[dict\] (all items with pricing details)                                                  â”‚
â”‚     **EACH ITEM MUST HAVE:**                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚     - item_name, category, order_quantity                                                                            â”‚
â”‚     - unit_price (original cost price)                                                                               â”‚
â”‚     - selling_price (price after 20% markup)                                                                         â”‚
â”‚     - total (selling_price Ã— quantity)                                                                               â”‚
â”‚     - unavailable_items: list[dict\] (CRITICAL: ALWAYS include this field, even if empty [])                         â”‚
â”‚     **EACH UNAVAILABLE ITEM MUST HAVE:**                                                                             â”‚
â”‚     - query: str (original search term from order_details)                                                           â”‚
â”‚     - order_quantity: int (requested quantity)                                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - reason: str (why item cannot be ordered)                                                                       â”‚
â”‚     - subtotal: float (before discount)                                                                              â”‚
â”‚     - discount_percent: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                   â”‚
â”‚     - discount_amount: float (0.0 if no discount)                                                                    â”‚
â”‚     - final_total: float (subtotal - discount_amount)                                                                â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     If discount_percent = 0:                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚     - Set discount_amount = 0.0                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - Set final_total = subtotal                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚     - Do NOT mention discount in quotation_text                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     If discount_percent > 0:                                                                                         â”‚
â”‚     - Calculate discount_amount                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚     - Calculate final_total                                                                                          â”‚
â”‚     - DO mention discount in quotation_text                                                                          â”‚

â”‚ CRITICAL JSON FORMATTING RULES:                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ When returning JSON responses, you MUST follow these rules exactly:                                                  â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ 1. ALWAYS return valid, parseable JSON                                                                               â”‚
â”‚ 2. Use DOUBLE QUOTES for all strings (not single quotes)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 3. Do NOT escape quotes in your response                                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 4. For multi-line text, use the escaped newline character \n (not actual line breaks)                                â”‚
â”‚ 5. Return ONLY the JSON object - no markdown, no code blocks, no explanations                                        â”‚
â”‚ 6. Ensure all brackets and braces are properly closed                                                                â”‚
â”‚ 7. Use null for missing values (not None, not undefined)                                                             â”‚
â”‚ 8. Use true/false for booleans (not True/False)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ CORRECT FORMAT:                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ {                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "key": "value",                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚   "multiline": "Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3",                                                                             â”‚
â”‚   "number": 42,                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚   "boolean": true,                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚   "nullable": null,                                                                                                  â”‚
â”‚   "list": ["item1", "item2"\]                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚ }                                                                                                                    â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ INCORRECT FORMATS (DO NOT USE):                                                                                      â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "value"}  (escaped quotes)                                                                                â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": "Line 1                                                                                                   â”‚
â”‚     Line 2"}  (literal newlines)                                                                                     â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {'key': 'value'}  (single quotes)                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚ âŒ ```json {...}```  (markdown code blocks)                                                                          â”‚
â”‚ âŒ {"key": None}  (Python None instead of null)                                                                      â”‚
â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚
